text: Mba tugivigen Zisas khaŋ wo phorga rui gumgi ga nzuai, “Gu taagip Zerusareman naaŋv, mba ŋgui gari gumgi pani, gu Fhe Bakɨme rotu gari gumgir pani, gu Zudaiŋ tɨvir vhuuiŋ kaŋgi gumgir pani, mbe zaagi vhɨrver nan nɨɨnga. Mbe na shogirim, gu rimgip, ra phuni khegene vhɨzgirim, gu taagip khavgirga.”
